name: cited_by_count
description: The total number Works that cite a work this author has created.

name: counts_by_year

fields.name: cited_by_count
fields.description: The total number  Works that cite a work this author has created.

fields.name: works_count
fields.description: The number of  Works this this author has created.

fields.name: year
fields.description: The year.

description: Author.works_count and Author.cited_by_count for each of the last ten years, binned by year. To put it another way: each year, you can see how many works this author published, and how many times they got cited. Any works or citations older than ten years old aren't included.

name: created_date
description: The date this Author object was created in the OpenAlex dataset, expressed as an ISO 8601 date string.

name: display_name
description: The name of the author as a single string.

name: display_name_alternatives
description: Other ways that we've found this author's name displayed.

name: id
description: The OpenAlex ID for this author.

name: ids

fields.name: mag
fields.description: this author's Microsoft Academic Graph ID

fields.name: openalex
fields.description: this author's OpenAlex ID. Same as Author.id

fields.name: orcid
fields.description: this author's ORCID ID. Same as Author.orcid

fields.name: scopus
fields.description: this author's Scopus author ID

fields.name: twitter
fields.description: this author's Twitter handle

fields.name: wikipedia
fields.description: this author's Wikipedia page

description: All the persistent identifiers (PIDs) that we know about for this author, as key: value pairs, where key is the PID namespace, and value is the PID. IDs are expressed as URIs where possible. The openalex ID is the same one you'll find at Author.id. All the IDs are strings except for mag, which is an integer.

name: last_known_institution

fields.name: country_code
fields.description: The country where this institution is located, represented as an ISO two-letter country code.

fields.name: display_name
fields.description: The primary name of the institution.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The OpenAlex ID for this institution.

fields.name: ror
fields.description: The ROR ID for this institution. The ROR (Research Organization Registry) identifier is a globally unique ID for research organization. ROR is the successor to GRiD, which is no longer being updated.

fields.name: type
fields.description: The institution's primary type, using the ROR "type" controlled vocabulary. Possible values are: Education, Healthcare, Company, Archive, Nonprofit, Government, Facility, and Other.

description: This author's last known institutional affiliation. In this context "last known" means that we took all the Works where this author has an institutional affiliation, sorted them by publication date, and selected the most recent one. This is a dehydrated Institution object, and you can find more documentation on the Institution page.

name: most_cited_work
description: The title of the most cited work.

name: orcid
description: The ORCID for this author. ORCID global and unique ID for authors.

fields.name: 2yr_mean_citedness
fields.description: The 2-year mean citedness for this author. Also known as impact factor.

fields.name: h_index
fields.description: The h-index for this author.

fields.name: i10_index
fields.description: The i-10 index for this author.

name: updated_date
description: The last time anything in this author object changed, expressed as an ISO 8601 date string. This date is updated for any change at all, including increases in various counts.

name: works_api_url
description: A URL that will get you a list of all this author's works. We express this as an API URL (instead of just listing the works themselves) because sometimes an author's publication list is too long to reasonably fit into a single author object.

name: works_count
description: The number of Works this this author has created.

name: x_concepts

fields.name: display_name
fields.description: The English-language label of the concept.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The OpenAlex ID for this concept.

fields.name: level
fields.description: The level in the concept tree where this concept lives.

fields.name: score
fields.description: The strength of association between this author and the listed concept, from 0-100.

fields.name: wikidata
fields.description: The Wikidata ID for this concept.

description: The "x" in x_concepts is because it's experimental and subject to removal with very little warning. We plan to replace it with a custom link to the Concepts API endpoint.
